text: Sharda Deepakraj Lala (born 10 December 1980) is an financial advisor and entrepreneur from Akola, Maharashtra, India. She is the founder of Siddhant Wealth Managers. The firm specializes in a wide range of financial products and services including mutual funds, life insurance, health insurance, car/bike insurance, general insurance. == References == == Other websites == Website Sharda Deepakraj Lala On LinkedIn Category:Living people Category:1980 births Category:People from Maharashtra
title: Sharda Deepakraj Lala
